course_description: Offers a detailed historical examination of Western classical music composed since 1900, emphasizing both repertoire and the cultural practice of music-making. Assignments include midterm and final exams and one research paper.
prerequisites: MUS 200 or MUS_OX 200 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3641, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: H. Senungetuk, Status: Open
